author: amerkay
description: Smart Water Doser for Farmbot: Checks the weather and calculates how much water to dose each plant. The code is as annotated as could be, so have a look at https://github.com/amerkay/smart-water-doser/

config.name: plant_search_radius
config.label: Use current location to search for closest plant within this radius.

config.name: water_ml_per_sec
config.label: Filter by plant name, case insensitive. 'aru' matches 'Arugula', * for all.

config.name: weather_lat
config.label: Your Farmbot's location Latitude from (lat,lon) for weather/rain reports.

config.name: weather_lon
config.label: Your Farmbot's location Longitude from (lat,lon) for weather/rain reports.

config.name: debug
config.label: Debug mode (0-> No FW debug msg, 1-> FW debug msg (default), 2-> No move/exec - do save point data, 3-> simulation, log only)
help: 2 -> no move, no execute sequences. Do save point data and farmware debug log
3 -> simulation mode. No move, no execute sequence, no save meta data. Enable farmware debug log
